column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The best part is you get a free dessert tapas with each person who checks in on yelp! We ended up with a couple of desserts from the check ins including the caramelized banana
column2: natilla flan (which has a really great saffron flavor)
column3: the almond caramel bar and the chocolate truffle cake. All were really yummy!
